name: Origin Workbook Template
summary: Learn about .OTW files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: You can only open OTW files with Origin, which can be used to create, open, and edit OTW files. The program is only available for Windows.
To open an OTW file in Origin, select File â†’ Open..., select the "Origin Template .otw" file type, navigate to the OTW file location, and click Open.
NOTE: The release of Origin 2018 included an updated unicode format for saving workbook templates (.OTWU), which features performance advantages over the older, non-unicode OTW file format.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
